DOC.brief_summary: Define the efficacy of CP-751,871 in patients with Ewing's sarcoma family of tumors
DOC.brief_title: Study Of CP-751,871 In Patients With Ewing's Sarcoma Family Of Tumors
DOC.criteria: Ewing's family of tumors Current disease state for which there is no curative therapy Prior antiIGF1R therapy Concurrent treatment with other anticancer agents
